title: Medical procedure log
description: Each entry describes a medical procedure administered to patient.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of the surgery.

person_id.description: the patient to who underwent the procedure.

body_site_code.description: This enumeration includes all codes from FHIR's body-site definition http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/body-site.

diagnosis_id.description: Reference to the diagnosis requiring the medical procedure.

procedure_name.description: A textual name of the procedure e.g. x-ray

procedure_sctid.description: SNOWMED CT ID referencing a surgical procedure

procedure_results_url.description: URL refering to archived digital scans, notes etc.

procedure_results_notes.description: notes and observations from medical profesional regarding the procedure and results
